allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial release: CLAW-MAN retro arcade shrimp harvester

- Pac-Man style game with Phaser.js \(maze generation, shrimp collection, ghost AI\)
- OG Pac-Man ghost personalities \(Blinky, Pinky, Inky, Clyde\) with scatter/chase/frightened modes
- Golden shrimp power pellet mechanic \(ghosts turn blue, edible for 200/400/800/1600 pts\)
- CRT retro arcade UI with scanlines, neon glow effects, and flicker animation
- Live feed, leaderboard, AI commentary, stats panel, shrimp rain feature
- Mobile support with virtual D-pad touch controls
- Responsive layout for all screen sizes
- Ready for Vercel deployment

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
